languages.text: Защищая юное царство свободы, Номос возвели пространственные барьеры, что отсекли Простор от Империума надежнее Великого Разлома. Человечество Коронуса оказалось в изоляции — полагаясь лишь на себя, им предстояло построить нечто новое и отличное от Империума либо пасть, не справившись с ужасами, ждущими во тьме.

Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.
languages.original_text: Защищая юное царство свободы, Номос возвели пространственные барьеры, что отсекли Простор от Империума надежнее Великого Разлома. Человечество Коронуса оказалось в изоляции — полагаясь лишь на себя, им предстояло построить нечто новое и отличное от Империума либо пасть, не справившись с ужасами, ждущими во тьме.

traits.locale_text: Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The humanity of Koronus was left in isolation. Now they had to rely only on themselves and either build something new, different from the Imperium, or fall to the horrors hiding in the dark.

Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The humanity of Koronus was left in isolation. Now they had to rely only on themselves and either build something new, different from the Imperium, or fall to the horrors hiding in the dark.

Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The humanity of Koronus was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors hiding in the dark.

Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The humanity of Koronus was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors hiding in the dark.

Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

languages.text: 为了保护年轻的自由王国，诺莫斯创造出了维度屏障，将科罗努斯扩区与帝国隔离开来。这道屏障比大裂隙更加牢固，科罗努斯扩区的人们被彻底孤立。现在，他们只能依靠自己，要么创造出某些不同于帝国的新事物，要么就此堕入黑暗与恐怖的魔爪之中。
languages.original_text: Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

traits.locale_text: 为了保护年轻的自由王国，诺莫斯创造出了维度屏障，将科罗努斯扩区与帝国隔离开来。这道屏障比大裂隙更加牢固，科罗努斯扩区的人们被彻底孤立。现在，他们只能依靠自己，要么创造出某些不同于帝国的新事物，要么就此堕入黑暗与恐怖的魔爪之中。

languages.text: Nomos beschützten das junge Königreich der Freiheit durch Dimensionsbarrieren, welche die Koronus-Ausdehnung gründlicher vom Imperium abkapselten als der Große Riss. Die Menschen der Ausdehnung lebten in völliger Isolation. Sie waren vollkommen auf sich allein gestellt und mussten entweder etwas Neues erschaffen, vom Imperium losgelöst, oder von den Grauen vernichtet werden, die sich in der Dunkelheit versteckten.
languages.original_text: Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

traits.locale_text: Nomos beschützten das junge Königreich der Freiheit durch Dimensionsbarrieren, welche die Ausdehnung gründlicher vom Imperium abkapselten als der Große Riss. Die Menschen in Koronus lebten in völliger Isolation. Sie waren vollkommen auf sich allein gestellt und mussten entweder etwas Neues erschaffen, vom Imperium losgelöst, oder von den Grauen vernichtet werden, die sich in der Dunkelheit versteckten.

languages.text: Pour protéger le jeune royaume de la liberté, Nomos créa des barrières dimensionnelles qui coupèrent les Étendues de Koronus de l'Imperium plus profondément encore que la Grande Faille. Les humains des Étendues se retrouvèrent ainsi isolés. Ne pouvant compter que sur eux-mêmes, ils durent bâtir une société nouvelle et différente de l'Imperium pour ne pas succomber aux horreurs tapies dans l'obscurité.
languages.original_text: Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

traits.locale_text: Pour protéger le jeune royaume de la liberté, Nomos créa des barrières dimensionnelles qui coupèrent les Étendues de l'Imperium plus profondément encore que la Grande Faille. Les humains de Koronus se retrouvèrent ainsi isolés. Ne pouvant compter que sur eux-mêmes, ils durent bâtir une société nouvelle et différente de l'Imperium pour ne pas succomber aux horreurs tapies dans l'obscurité.

languages.text: Para proteger el joven reino de la libertad, Nomos creó barreras interdimensionales que separaron a la Extensión de Koronus del Imperium de forma más definitiva que la Gran Fisura. La Humanidad de la Extensión quedó aislada. Sin ayuda externa, no tenía más opciones que construir algo nuevo y distinto al Imperium o caer presa de los horrores que acechan en la oscuridad.
languages.original_text: Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

traits.locale_text: Para proteger el joven reino de la libertad, Nomos creó barreras interdimensionales que separaron a la Extensión del Imperium de forma más definitiva que la Gran Fisura. La Humanidad de Koronus quedó aislada. Sin ayuda externa, no tenía más opciones que construir algo nuevo y distinto al Imperium o caer presa de los horrores que acechan en la oscuridad.

languages.text: 若き自由の王国を守るべく、ノモスは次元の障壁を作り、大亀裂よりも強固に帝国からコロヌス・エクスパンスを孤立させた。エクスパンスの人類は孤立無援となった。彼らに与えられた選択肢は、自分たちだけを頼りに帝国とは異なる新たな何かを築き上げるか、闇に潜む恐怖に飲まれるかのどちらかしかなかった。
languages.original_text: Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

traits.locale_text: 若き自由の王国を守るべく、ノモスは次元の障壁を作り、大亀裂よりも強固に帝国からコロヌス・エクスパンスを孤立させた。エクスパンスの人類は孤立無援となった。彼らに与えられた選択肢は、自分たちだけを頼りに帝国とは異なる新たな何かを築き上げるか、闇に潜む恐怖に飲まれるかのどちらかしかなかった。

languages.text: Yeni özgürlük krallığını koruyan Nomos; Koronus Enginliği'ni İmparatorluk'tan, Büyük Yarık'tan bile daha kesin bir şekilde ayıran boyutsal bariyerler yarattı. Enginlik'teki İnsanlığın herkesle bağlantısı koptu. Artık ya İmparatorluk'tan farklı, yeni bir şey inşa edeceklerdi ya da karanlıkta kol gezen dehşetlere kurban gideceklerdi.
languages.original_text: Protecting the young kingdom of freedom, Nomos created dimensional barriers that cut the Koronus Expanse off from the Imperium more soundly than the Great Rift. The Humanity of the Expanse was left in isolation. Relying only on themselves, they either had to build something new and different from the Imperium or fall to the horrors lurking in the darkness.

traits.locale_text: Genç krallığın özgürlüğünü koruyan Nomos, Koronus Enginliği'ni İmparatorluk'tan, Büyük Yarık'tan bile daha kesin bir şekilde ayıran boyutsal bariyerler yarattı. Enginlik'teki İnsanlık izole hâlde kaldı. Artık ya İmparatorluk'tan farklı, yeni bir şey inşa edeceklerdi, ya da karanlıkta kol gezen dehşetlere kurban gideceklerdi.
